name: Lover's Trophy
description:
What you're in for!


You are currently a unemployed loser, spending their last day at a motel in Little Rock, Washington State. You grew up here, but the town has changed since then. You need to figure out what to do, what will change your life! You only have one day left before you're doomed to sleep in your car... Good thing others have something in store for you... all the while two men wriggle their way into your life!

Experience a whirlwind of a story, and let these two men take you on a phsycological journey.

The main character is completely customizable and up to you regarding body parts and pronouns. Sex scenes are completely tailored to your preferred pronouns and genitialia.

Dive into a thrilling psychological experience with two eligible "Love" Interests.


Wade Curtis
Born and bred from a slew of unfortunate circumstances, Wade has always wanted to become a dentist. After being removed from several schools of dentistry, theres only one way now to scratch that itch. Deciding to go down his path will show you what it's like to be under the knife! Quite literally!

Jak Harasi
With an immediate interest in you upon meeting, Jak's mind is an ever evolving puzzle. What does he want from you? It almost seems too simple? Everything going too well. He's nice, charismatic, and seems to be well mannered... who knows what goes on in his mind when he's alone at home... with you locked by his side.
